title: Language Proficiency Improvement Program Through Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, combining blended approaches of offline classes and online collaborative activities

learning_goals: Learners can perform role division and communication to complete language tasks in a 4-member collaborative learning group
Learners can write at least one group report using digital collaboration tools (e.g., KakaoTalk Open Chat, Google Docs)
Learners can achieve an 80%+ improvement rate by evaluating their ability to revise language expressions based on peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
